review:
In the year 2019 July my wife Jyothi was diagnosed with three blocks in her arteries which were 90 % @ that time it was our maiden visit to Dr  Arvind Sampath a seasoned doctor and takes great care of his patients he first puts you to ease and your anxiety is well handled.
my wife underwent Balloon Angioplasty  and followed with Stent in Apollo Vanagaram excellent care and medication was given by Doctor S Aravind, a brilliant cardiologist with immense humility we wish him all the best .

We have gone for a regular checkup and found a three blocks and recommended cabg by doctor Aravind sir and got clear of mind about surgery and underwent cabg with his supervision and till follwed by him after 3 month .Takes good care on patient and explain what's happening and cause clearly
